methods.name: messages.deleteConversation
methods.description: Deletes all private messages in a conversation.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID. To clear a chat history use 'peer_id'

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Group ID (for group messages with user access token)

parameters.name: peer_id
parameters.description: Destination ID. "For user: 'User ID', e.g. '12345'. For chat: '2000000000' + 'chat_id', e.g. '2000000001'. For community: '- community ID', e.g. '-12345'. "
